test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `distinct-values()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-2
test-case.description: Invoke fn:distinct-values() with a collation argument, although the function does not perform string comparison. For that reason, output is valid as well.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `distinct-values("a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `distinct-values("a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "a string"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(distinct-values(()))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(distinct-values( ("1", 1, 2, 1, 1, 3, 1, 1, 3, xs:anyURI("example.com/"), xs:anyURI("example.com/"))), ("1", 1, 2, 3, xs:anyURI("example.com/")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `distinct-values((1, 1))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `distinct-values((-3, -3))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(distinct-values((1, 2.0, 3, 2))) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(distinct-values((1, 2.0, 3, 2)), (1, 2.0, 3))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `exists(distinct-values((1, 2, 3, 1)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(empty(distinct-values((1, 1))))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(distinct-values((1, 2, 2, current-time()))) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(distinct-values(())) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-15
test-case.description: fn:distinct-values() applied on an argument of cardinality exactly-one.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDistinctValuesFunc-1
test-case.description: Invoke fn:distinct-values() with an invalid collation.

test-case.name: fn-distinct-values-1
test-case.description: Test Bugzilla #5183, [FO] Effect of type promotion in fn:distinct-values
test-case.test: let $input := (xs:float('1.0'), xs:decimal('1.0000000000100000000001'), xs:double( '1.00000000001'), xs:float('2.0'), xs:decimal('2.0000000000100000000001'), xs:double( '2.00000000001')), $distinct := distinct-values($input) return ( (every $n in $input satisfies $n = $distinct) and (every $bool in (for $d1 at $p in $distinct, $d2 in $distinct [position() > $p] return $d1 eq $d2) satisfies not($bool)) )

test-case.name: fn-distinct-values-2
test-case.description: distinct-values() on a somewhat larger set of values
test-case.test: distinct-values((1 to 300, 100 to 400, 29, 145, 20 to 50, for $x in (30 to 40) return xs:string($x), "foo", "bar"))
